protocol.name: P-GSE24517-1
text: ABS_CALL = indicating whether the transcript was present (P), absent (A), or marginal (M)

protocol.name: P-GSE24517-2
protocol.text: After 6 days of growth in 0.5 µmol m-2 s-1 blue plus red (BR) light, seedlings grown in the presence (+Lin) or absence (-Lin) of lincomycin were transferred to 60 µmol m-2 s-1 BR light.   50-100 seedlings were collected, frozen, and stored at -80°C before (0 h) and 0.5 h, 1 h, 4 h, and 24 h after the 0.5 to 60 µmol m-2 s-1 BR-fluence-rate shift.

protocol.name: P-GSE24517-3
protocol.text: Col-0 seeds were surface-sterilized with ethanol, and plated on Linsmaier and Skoog medium containing 2% sucrose and 0.5% Phytoblend (Caisson Laboratories).  0.5mM lincomycin was included to the growth medium to block chloroplast biogenesis.  Seeds were stratified for 4 d at 4°C, irradiated with 125µmol m-2 s-1 red light for 1h at 21°C, incubated in the dark for 23h at 21°C, and incubated for 6 d in 0.5 µmol m-2 s-1 blue plus red (BR) light at 21°C.

protocol.name: P-GSE24517-4
protocol.text: RNA was extracted with Qiagen Rneasy Plant Mini Kit (Qiagen, Valencia, CA) performed according to the manufacturer's instructions.

protocol.name: P-GSE24517-5
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 5 µg total RNA for each sample using the GeneChip One-Cycle Target Labeling (Affymetrix, Santa Clara CA).

protocol.name: P-GSE24517-6
protocol.text: For each sample, 15μg of labeled target cRNA was purified, fragmented, and hybridized to the GeneChip® Arabidopsis ATH1 Genome Array (Affymetrix) as recommended by the manufacturer. The GeneChip arrays were then washed and stained using a GeneChip Fluidics Station 450 (Affymetrix)

protocol.name: P-GSE24517-7
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned using the GeneChip® Scanner 3000 7G (Affymetrix).

protocol.name: P-GSE24517-8
protocol.text: The data were analyzed with Microarray Suite version 5.0 (MAS 5.0) using Affymetrix default analysis settings and global scaling as normalization method. The trimmed mean target intensity of each array was arbitrarily set to 100. In the manuscript, the data were normalized using GCRMA in R/Bioconductor (data provided as supplementary file: GSE24517.txt.gz).  Posterior probabilities were calculated using an empirical Bayes analysis on a per gene, per time point, and per treatment basis.  Samples Light_0h_(-LIN)_1 through Light_0h_(-LIN)_4 were used as the reference samples for -Lin at 0.5 h and 1 h.  Samples Light_0h_(+LIN)_1 through Light_0h_(+LIN)_4 were used as the reference samples for +Lin at 0.5 h and 1 h.  Samples Light_0h_(-LIN)_5 through Light_0h_(-LIN)_8 were used as the reference samples for -Lin at 4 h and 24 h.  Samples Light_0h_(+LIN)_5 through Light_0h_(+LIN)_8 were used as the reference samples for +Lin at 4 h and 24 h.
